channel.title: Planet of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the planet of the day.

item.title: Neptunian exoplanet
item.description: Neptunian exoplanets are similar in size to Neptune or Uranus in the Solar System. Neptunian exoplanets may have a mixture of interiors though all would be rocky with heavier metals at their cores. Neptunian planets typically have hydrogen- and helium-dominated atmospheres.
